about_the_game:
Enjoy the original soundtrack for Lost Eidolons, composed by Clark Aboud. Immerse yourself in this compilation of Lost Eidolons music, reliving poignant moments of Eden’s journey... or basking in the rush of adrenaline you had in the last battle.

Credits

Composed and Produced by Clark Aboud

"Power of the Lost" & "Broken Promises" - Written by Sophie Aboud & Clark Aboud || Performed by ABOUD || Mastered by Will Borza

Soundtrack performed by Sofia Session Orchestra || Conductor - Lyubomir Denev Jr. || Concertmaster - Irina Stoyanova || Session Producer - Georgi Elenkov PhD || Historical Bowed Strings - Niccolo Seligman || Woodwinds - Josh Plotner || Sound Engineers - Plamen Penchev, Angelia Vihrova, Vladislav Boyadjiev || Contracting Services - Boris Radilov, Delyan Kolev (FourForMusic Ltd.) || Session Librarian - Velislava Georgieva
detailed_description:
Enjoy the original soundtrack for Lost Eidolons, composed by Clark Aboud. Immerse yourself in this compilation of Lost Eidolons music, reliving poignant moments of Eden’s journey... or basking in the rush of adrenaline you had in the last battle.

Credits

Composed and Produced by Clark Aboud

"Power of the Lost" & "Broken Promises" - Written by Sophie Aboud & Clark Aboud || Performed by ABOUD || Mastered by Will Borza

Soundtrack performed by Sofia Session Orchestra || Conductor - Lyubomir Denev Jr. || Concertmaster - Irina Stoyanova || Session Producer - Georgi Elenkov PhD || Historical Bowed Strings - Niccolo Seligman || Woodwinds - Josh Plotner || Sound Engineers - Plamen Penchev, Angelia Vihrova, Vladislav Boyadjiev || Contracting Services - Boris Radilov, Delyan Kolev (FourForMusic Ltd.) || Session Librarian - Velislava Georgieva

name: Lost Eidolons - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1600 MB available space

short_description: This is the original soundtrack for Lost Eidolons, composed by Clark Aboud. Immerse yourself in the 80-minute-long compilation of Lost Eidolons music, reliving poignant moments of Eden’s journey... or basking in the rush of adrenaline you had in the last battle.
